|Inserted the adventurer brain into the machine.|
|Your head starts to hurt from trying to understand something as alien as this.|

Synopsis: tarted by interacting with the device. Allows player to insert certain brains in it and read part of their contents. There are currently three brains that can be read. That of a Shar cleric that will reveal a hint on the acquisition of the box. A brain of an adventurer that reveals the location of a secret in WLD or SCL. And the brain of a mindflayer that has a tbd secret.
